summary: Completed frontend UI testing for Indian HR Consulting data seeding feature. All major functionalities verified: Login with seeded credentials works, Dashboard displays correct counts (45 leads, 6 closed deals), Leads page shows Indian company data (Tata Steel, Reliance, Infosys, etc.), Employees page shows 41 employees with proper Indian names and designations. Navigation to all 9 major modules tested successfully.

issues: Budget displayed in $ instead of ₹ (INR) - minor currency symbol issue
Active Projects shows 0 - This is correct behavior since all 6 seeded projects have 'completed' status (dates are in past). Not a bug but may need note in documentation.

action_items: Optional: Update Projects.js to display budget in ₹ (INR) instead of $ since this is an Indian HR consulting app
critical_code_review_comments: Data seeding script creates comprehensive Indian HR consulting data
Indian company names properly displayed (Tata Steel, Reliance, Infosys, Wipro, HCL, Mahindra, etc.)
Indian names properly generated (Sharma, Verma, Singh, Patel, etc.)
Lead scoring system working with proper breakdown (Title/Contact/Engagement)
All data-testid attributes present for testability

success_rate.backend: 100% (41/41 tests passed as per previous iteration)

seed_data_creation: Data already seeded via seed_indian_data.py - 42 users, 41 employees, 45 leads, 6 clients, 6 projects, 96 tasks, 48 meetings, 120 expenses, 2665 attendance records
context_for_next_testing_agent: Indian HR Consulting data seeding fully tested. Dashboard shows 45 leads, 6 closed deals, 0 active projects (all projects are completed status). All navigation working. Budget currency shows $ instead of ₹ on Projects page - minor display issue.

mocked_apis_list: Email sending - logs to console instead of actually sending
